mapper.update: update orderm om set om.ordermprinttimes=#{ordermprinttimes},om.updor=#{updor} where om.ordermid=#{ordermid}
mapper.select:
select * from orderm om left join customer c on c.customerid = om.ordermcustomer left join company com on com.companyid = om.ordermcompany where om.ordermstatue != '已删除' and
om.ordermid = #{ordermid}

SELECT * FROM ( select om.*,c.customershop from orderm om left join customer c on c.customerid = om.ordermcustomer where om.ordermcompany = #{ordermcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by om.ordermtime desc ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
select orderm.*,orderd.* from orderm left outer join orderd on orderd.orderdorderm = orderm.ordermid where orderm.ordermid = #{ordermid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into ORDERM
ORDERMID,
ORDERMCUSTOMER,
ORDERMCOMPANY,
ORDERMCODE,
ORDERMNUM,
ORDERMMONEY,
ORDERMRIGHTMONEY,
ORDERMWAY,
ORDERMSTATUE,
ORDERMDETAIL,
ORDERMTIME,
ORDERMCONNECT,
ORDERMPHONE,
ORDERMADDRESS,
UPDTIME,
UPDOR,
ORDERMEMP,
ORDERMCUSSHOP,
ORDERMCUSLEVEL,
ORDERMCUSTYPE,
ORDERMPRINTTIMES,
#{ordermid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ordermcustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ordermcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ordermcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ordermnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{ordermmoney,jdbcType=FLOAT},
#{ordermrightmoney,jdbcType=FLOAT},
#{ordermway,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{ordermconnect,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ordermphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ordermaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{updor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{ordermcusshop,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update ORDERM
ORDERMCUSTOMER = #{ordermcustomer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERMCOMPANY = #{ordermcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERMCODE = #{ordermcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERMNUM = #{ordermnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDERMMONEY = #{ordermmoney,jdbcType=FLOAT},
ORDERMRIGHTMONEY = #{ordermrightmoney,jdbcType=FLOAT},
ORDERMWAY = #{ordermway,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERMSTATUE = #{ordermstatue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERMDETAIL = #{ordermdetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERMTIME = #{ordermtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERMCONNECT = #{ordermconnect,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERMPHONE = #{ordermphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERMADDRESS = #{ordermaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDTIME = #{updtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDOR = #{updor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERMEMP = #{ordermemp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERMCUSSHOP = #{ordermcusshop,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERMCUSLEVEL = #{ordermcuslevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERMCUSTYPE = #{ordermcustype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERMPRINTTIMES = #{ordermprinttimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDERMID = #{ordermid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
